mods.abstract: Profile of statuette (Ptolemaic Period) at an Egyptian Museum of combined gods with the crocodile body of the Nile god Sobek, and the falcon head of Haroeris, one of the oldest forms of Horus, resting on a flat stone pedestal; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
